abstract: United States submits draft resolution for consideration by United Nations Human Rights Council calling for international inquiry into human rights abuses in Burundi.
lead_paragraph: The American request to send a team of experts to the African nation will be considered by the United Nations Human Rights Council in a special session in Geneva.

headline.main: U.S. Calls for Inquiry Into Rights Abuses in Burundi
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; U.S. Seeks an Investigation Into Rights Abuses in Burundi

snippet: The American request to send a team of experts to the African nation will be considered by the United Nations Human Rights Council in a special session in Geneva.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
